author: rdonkin
msg: Refactored the download pages. Now only mirrored releases are shown on the front line page. Also, every link goes directly to a release rather than a directory. The reason for this change is that people were going for the main distribtion site rather than the mirrors. This way, there are no instructions about the main site and hopefully people will be more likely to use the mirrors.

author: rdonkin
msg: This is a new page for releases which are not mirrored plus probably also non-current releases. These have been moved from the front line download page since the stastics shows that a lot of folks were going straight for one of these rather than for the mirrors.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added some documentation to help subprojects switch to mirrored distributions.
